Location:
- Exterior HVAC condensing unit (Ingersoll Rand), on pad

Observations:
- Gray painted steel cabinet with louvered side panel
- Labels/warnings intact and legible; ETL listed
- Nameplate shows MCA 10.4A; Max fuse/HACR breaker 15A
- Access panel screws present; light scuffs on finish
- Refrigerant service area partially visible; disconnect/conduit not in view

Potential Issues:
- No visible issues (limited view)

Recommendations:
- Verify dedicated disconnect present and overcurrent protection does not exceed 15A per nameplate
- Keep coil/fan area clear and schedule routine HVAC cleaning/service
- Provide full-view photos (wiring/conduit, line-set insulation, pad level, fan guard) for complete evaluation
